member.name: T:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementProxy
member.summary: Proxy for Synchronous Service that updates User Data (for StoreCENTER) Read Operations are executed immediately and result is returned to caller Update Operations are only validated and passed to UserManagementAsyncUpdateService which does actual updates. Validation errors are returned to caller

member.name: M:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementProxy.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Override default constructor which will default to using the router.
member.param: Provide alternate URI for User Management Service.

member.name: M:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementProxy.ExecuteReadOperation(Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Contract.Operations.Read.UserManagementReadOperation)
member.summary: Executes desired Read Operation Read Operations are executed immediately and result is returned to caller Actual operation execution is Dispatched to concrete operation handler method according to operation type

member.name: M:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementProxy.ExecuteUpdateOperation(Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Contract.Operations.Update.UserManagementUpdateOperation)
member.summary: Executes desired Update Operation Operation execution is Dispatched to concrete operation handler method according to operation type Update Operations are only validated and passed to UserManagementAsyncUpdateService which does actual updates. Validation errors are returned to caller

member.name: T:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementAsyncUpdateProxy
member.summary: Proxy for User Management Asynchronous Update Service

member.name: T:Fujitsu.Utilities.UserManagement.Proxy.UserManagementProxyWithCertificateSecurity
member.summary: Proxy for Synchronous Service that updates User Data. The proxy uses certificate security. Read Operations are executed immediately and result is returned to caller Update Operations are only validated and passed to UserManagementAsyncUpdateService which does actual updates. Validation errors are returned to caller

member.summary: Override default constructor which will default to using the router.
member.param: Provide alternate URI for User Management Service.

member.summary: Executes desired Read Operation Read Operations are executed immediately and result is returned to caller Actual operation execution is Dispatched to concrete operation handler method according to operation type

member.summary: Executes desired Update Operation Operation execution is Dispatched to concrete operation handler method according to operation type Update Operations are only validated and passed to UserManagementAsyncUpdateService which does actual updates. Validation errors are returned to caller
